html: <object width='{{ width }}' height='{{ height }}'><param name='movie' value='http://www.youtube.com/v/{{ video_code }}&hl=en&fs=1'></param><param name='allowFullScreen' value='true'></param><embed src='http://www.youtube.com/v/{{ video_code }}&hl=en&fs=1' type='application/x-shockwave-flash' allowfullscreen='true' width='{{ width }}' height='{{ height }}'></embed></object>
